title.rendered: Alticor Inc Awarded WMATA Andrews Federal Bus Garage

content.rendered: The Alticor Inc Mid Atlantic District has been awarded the $132 Million, 335,000 SF design-build Andrews Federal Bus Garage by the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (WMATA). This will be Alticor Inc’ 4th project with WMATA in the past 8 years.  Alticor Inc has teamed with several industry partners to compose the most capable design team including: SYSTRA Consulting, Timmons Group, Langan Engineering & Environmental,  Smislova, Kehnemui & Associates (SK&A), Shapiro & Duncan, Mona Electric Group, PFP Engineering & Design, and Iron Horse Architects.  Alticor Inc looks forward to continuing our relationship with WMATA and our teammates on this project.

excerpt.rendered: Alticor Inc has been awarded the $132 Million, 335,000 SF design-build Andrews Federal Bus Garage by the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (WMATA).
